title: Dyed hair brown but did not like it, can I restore it to black? | AssimAlHakeem -JAL
transcript: muhammad from the philippines someone who dyed his hair so i dyed my hair brown and then i i didn't like it so i wanted to return it back to its original color which is black is this permissible if you're young and your hair is actually really black and you turned it into brown or blonde or whatever and then you wanted to restore it to the same some scholars said that this is permissible i personally believe that leave it until it fades away and it returns back to its original color just to be safe
